item.title: Automatic Subscription Removal
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

Players used to type ::VOTE to get a free subscription and then never logout to get much more than their 30 minute so I’ve made it check constantly.

public boolean isSub() { if (DataConversions.getTimeStamp() < subscriptionExpires) { isSub = true; return true; } else { if (isSub) { isSub = false; updateGroupID(4); sendAlert("Your subscription period has expired. Type @gre@" + Config.COMMAND_PREFIX + "SUBSCRIBE@whi@ for details on subscribing to " + Config.SERVER_NAME + "% %Remember you can type @gre@" + Config.COMMAND_PREFIX + "VOTE@whi@ once a day for a free 30 minute subscription."); } return false; } }

Read full topic
